item.title: 巴西航空工业公司承诺投资摩洛哥航空航天业
item.description: 摩洛哥工业部周三晚些时候表示，巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）已与摩洛哥签署了一项初步协议，将投资摩洛哥的民用和国防航空航天领域，包括建立一家维护和修理厂。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer has signed a preliminary deal with Morocco to invest in the nation's civilian and defence aerospace sector, including setting up a maintenance and repair plant, Morocco's industry ministry said late on Wednesday.】

item.title: Meta、微软成本警告凸显人工智能贸易风险，期货价格下跌
item.description: 华尔街期货周四大幅下跌，原因是 Meta Platforms 公司和微软公司就人工智能相关成本上升发出的警告，抑制了市场对巨型企业的乐观情绪，而巨型企业一直是今年市场的主要推动力。【原文：Wall Street futures fell sharply on Thursday, as warnings from Meta Platforms and Microsoft about rising artificial intelligence-related costs dampened optimism around megacaps, which have been the market's primary driver this year.】

item.title: 明年全球经济将稳健增长 3%：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社对大约 500 位经济学家进行的一项调查显示，随着主要央行在美国经济强劲的背景下实施一系列降息措施，明年全球经济增长将保持强劲步伐。【原文：Global economic growth will maintain its robust pace next year as major central banks implement a series of interest rate cuts against the backdrop of a strong U.S. economy, according to a Reuters poll of around 500 economists.】

item.title: 乘着经济增长的东风，大多数亚洲国家央行的降息步伐将慢于美联储：路透调查
item.description: 路透社的民意调查显示，大多数亚洲国家央行未来一年的降息速度将慢于美国联邦储备委员会，原因是稳健的经济增长缓解了维持货币稳定以对抗美元持续走强的压力。【原文：Most Asian central banks will cut interest rates slower than the U.S. Federal Reserve over the coming year, Reuters polls showed, as solid growth has eased pressure to maintain currency stability against a persistently strong dollar.】

item.title: 沃达丰与 Digi 签署收购罗马尼亚移动电信谅解备忘录
item.description: 移动集团沃达丰（Vodafone）和罗马尼亚运营商 Digi 周四表示，他们已与希腊电信组织（Hellenic Telecommunications Organization）签署谅解备忘录，收购其子公司罗马尼亚电信移动公司（TKRM）。【原文：Mobile group Vodafone and Romania-based operator Digi said on Thursday they had signed a memorandum of understanding with Hellenic Telecommunications Organization to buy its subsidiary Telekom Romania Mobile (TKRM).】

item.title: 尽管盈利超预期，但微软和 Meta 股价在法兰克福下跌
item.description: 尽管微软和 Meta 这两家美国科技集团的盈利超出了华尔街的预期，但在法兰克福上市的这两家公司的股票在周四早盘交易中双双下跌。【原文：Frankfurt-listed shares in Microsoft and Meta both fell in early trading on Thursday, even as earnings at the two U.S. tech groups beat Wall Street expectations.】

item.title: 受中国和东南亚出口拉动，马士基第三季度需求强劲
item.description: 船运公司马士基周四表示，第三季度需求强劲，尤其是受中国和东南亚出口的拉动，而全球供应链继续受到中东局势的影响。【原文：Shipping company Maersk said on Thursday it saw strong demand in the third quarter especially driven by exports out of China and Southeast Asia while the global supply chain continued to be upset by the situation in the Middle East.】

item.title: 装瓶商可口可乐 HBC 在第三季度收入增长超预期后上调年度预期
item.description: 装瓶商可口可乐公司（Coca-Cola HBC）周四上调了对第三季度有机收入增长的年度预期，并超出了市场预期，这主要得益于对能量、咖啡和气泡饮料的强劲需求。【原文：Bottler Coca-Cola HBC raised its annual forecast and exceeded market estimates for third-quarter organic revenue growth on Thursday, supported by strong demand for energy, coffee and sparkling drinks.】

item.title: 炼油利润率下降，道达尔能源第三季度收入减少
item.description: 法国石油巨头道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）周四公布的第三季度调整后净收入为 41 亿美元，创下三年来的新低，主要是受到炼油利润率下降和上游停工的影响。【原文：French oil major TotalEnergies reported third-quarter adjusted net income at a three-year low of $4.1 billion on Thursday, hit by collapsing refining margins and upstream outages.】

item.title: 天然气抵消炼油业疲软影响，壳牌第三季度利润超预期，达 60 亿美元
item.description: 壳牌周四公布的第三季度利润为 60 亿美元，比预期高出 12%，原因是炼油和石油贸易业绩的疲软被天然气销售的增长所抵消。【原文：Shell reported on Thursday third quarter profits of $6 billion that exceeded forecast by 12% as weaker refining and oil trading results were offset by higher gas sales.】

item.title: Stellantis 第三季度收入下降 27%，但公司在库存方面取得进展
item.description: 汽车制造商 Stellantis 周四表示，该公司第三季度收入同比下降 27%，降至 330 亿欧元，公司报告称在减少库存方面取得了进展。【原文：Automaker Stellantis said on Thursday its revenues fell by 27% year-on-year to 33 billion euros in the third quarter, as the company reported progress on reducing its inventories.】

item.title: 嘉士伯维持盈利预期，尽管中国、法国和英国啤酒销量下降
item.description: 啤酒制造商嘉士伯周四公布的第三季度销售额符合预期，并表示尽管中国、法国和英国的啤酒销量下降，但仍维持全年盈利预期。【原文：Brewer Carlsberg reported third-quarter sales in line with expectations on Thursday and said it maintained its full-year earnings forecast despite lower beer volumes in China, France and the UK.】

item.title: 日本央行行长上田在新闻发布会上的讲话
item.description: 日本央行周四维持超低利率不变，并表示有必要仔细审视全球经济发展情况，强调在决定下一步何时收紧政策时，将重点关注脆弱的国内经济复苏所面临的风险。【原文：The Bank of Japan maintained ultra-low interest rates on Thursday and signalled the need to scrutinise global economic developments, highlighting its focus on risks to a fragile domestic recovery in deciding when to next tighten policy.】

item.title: 松下电池部门第二季度营业利润增长 42
item.description: 日本松下控股公司（Panasonic Holdings）周四表示，尽管面临日本需求下降和北美地区因价格调整导致销售额下降的压力，但其电池制造能源部门的第二季度营业利润仍增长了42%。【原文：Japan's Panasonic Holdings said on Thursday the second-quarter operating profit of its battery-making energy unit rose 42%, despite pressure from decreasing demand in Japan and lower sales values in North America due to price revisions.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行第三季度盈利 65.5 亿美元
item.description: 瑞士国家银行（Swiss National Bank）周四表示，第三季度实现利润 56.7 亿瑞士法郎（约合 65.5 亿美元），原因是该央行受益于所持黄金、债券和股票的估值收益。【原文：The Swiss National Bank posted a profit of 5.67 billion Swiss francs ($6.55 billion) during the third quarter, it said on Thursday, as the central bank benefited from valuation gains on its gold, bond and equity holdings.】

item.title: 意法半导体再次下调 2024 年收入展望
item.description: 欧洲最大的芯片制造商意法半导体公司（STMicroelectronics）周四表示，其全年营收将处于早先指导区间的低端，这是该公司今年第三次下调业绩展望。【原文：STMicroelectronics , Europe's largest chipmaker by revenue, on Thursday said its full-year revenue would come at the low end of its earlier guidance range, its third cut to the outlook this year.】

item.title: 得益于投资银行，法国巴黎银行实现盈利预期
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas）周四表示，在消费金融和汽车租赁业务令人失望之后，投资银行部门交易活动的增加帮助其实现了第三季度的盈利预期。【原文：BNP Paribas said on Thursday that increased trading activity at its investment banking division helped it meet profit forecasts in the third quarter, after its consumer finance and car-leasing businesses disappointed.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Swiggy 首次公开募股获得诺基亚、富达等大型投资者 150 亿美元的出价
item.description: 四位消息人士周四告诉路透社，包括挪威主权财富基金Norges和富达（Fidelity）在内的大型投资者在Swiggy印度首次公开募股中的出价超过150亿美元，是为此类投资者预留的6.05亿美元份额的25倍。【原文：Big investors including Norway's sovereign wealth fund Norges and Fidelity have placed bids worth more than $15 billion in Swiggy's India IPO, 25 times the $605 million portion reserved for such investors, four sources told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 欧洲小型武器公司在军费开支激增的情况下仍在为现金而挣扎
item.description: 政府官员、企业和专家表示，即使乌克兰战争和其他冲突导致需求激增，欧洲的中小型防务公司仍难以获得推动创新和发展生产线所需的资金。【原文：Europe's small and medium-sized defence companies are struggling to access finance needed to drive innovation and grow production lines even as demand soars due to the war in Ukraine and other conflicts, government officials, firms and experts say.】

item.title: 欧洲经济增长反弹取决于储蓄难题
item.description: 欧洲家庭的积蓄越来越多，这使人们对消费者的慷慨解囊能够促进该地区经济发展的希望破灭，因为该地区的经济进一步落后于美国。【原文：European families are sitting on an ever-growing pile of savings, confounding hopes that consumer largesse can boost the region's economy as it falls yet further behind that of the United States.】

item.title: 报告称，马斯克的 X 无法有效抵御美国大选误导信息的激增
item.description: 反数字仇恨中心（CCDH）在本周三的一份报告中称，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）旗下 X 公司的众包事实核查功能 "社区笔记"（Community Notes）"未能反击 "有关美国大选的不实言论。【原文：The crowd-sourced fact-checking feature of Elon Musk's X, Community Notes, is "failing to counter false" claims about the U.S. election, the Center for Countering Digital Hate (CCDH) said in a report on Wednesday.】

item.title: 早间竞标：Mag 7 "收益乌云密布
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 萨瓦德尔第三季度净利润比 2023 年同期增长 8
item.description: 西班牙萨瓦德尔银行（Sabadell）周四表示，第三季度净利润比2023年同期增长8%，原因是拨备减少和贷款收入稳定，而此时该银行正在努力抵御竞争对手BBVA的收购要约。【原文：Spain's Sabadell on Thursday said its third-quarter net profit rose 8% from the same period in 2023 on lower provisions and stable lending income at a moment when it is trying to fend off a takeover bid from rival BBVA .】

item.title: 澳大利亚银行因成本和竞争压力导致盈利下降
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的银行预计将在下周公布较低的年度收益报告，投资者关注的焦点是，贷款领域的激烈竞争和存款成本的上升是否会超过抵押贷款收入的增长。【原文：Australia's biggest banks are expected to report lower annual earnings next week, with investors focused on whether intense competition in lending and the rising costs of deposits will outweigh gains in mortgage revenues.】

item.title: 中国商飞在香港设立办事处并签订维修协议，进一步拓展海外市场
item.description: 中国商飞公司（COMAC）的一家子公司周四表示，中国商飞本周在香港开设了中国大陆以外的第二个办事处，这家国有企业正试图打入由西方制造商主导的全球客机市场。【原文：Chinese planemaker COMAC opened in Hong Kong its second office this week outside mainland China, a subsidiary said on Thursday, as the state-owned company tries to break into a global passenger jet market dominated by Western manufacturers.】

item.title: 住友商事上半年净利润为 2,540 亿日元，下降 11
item.description: 日本贸易公司住友商事（Sumitomo Corp）周四公布，截至 9 月份的六个月净利润为 2,540 亿日元（17 亿美元），比去年同期下降 11%，部分原因是煤炭价格疲软。【原文：Japanese trading house Sumitomo Corp posted on Thursday net profit of 254 billion yen ($1.7 billion) for the six months to September, down 11% from the corresponding period a year ago, partially hit by weak coal prices.】

item.title: 博世下调来年收入预期，不排除裁员可能
item.description: 德国汽车零部件供应商罗伯特-博世（ROBG.UL）董事长周四警告称，未来一年公司收入将下降，并表示不排除在已宣布裁员7000人的基础上，在德国进一步裁员的可能。【原文：The chairman of German auto parts supplier Robert Bosch (ROBG.UL) warned on Thursday of declining revenue in the coming year, and said he cannot rule out further job cuts in Germany in addition to the 7,000 it has already announced.】

item.title: 日本央行维持利率稳定，大致维持物价预测
item.description: 此举表明，美国准备继续缩减大规模货币刺激政策。【原文：The move signals its readiness to continue rolling back its massive monetary stimulus.】

item.title: Meta、微软提高人工智能支出，亚马逊财报发布前华尔街忧心忡忡
item.description: 包括微软和 Meta 在内的大型科技公司正在加大投入，建设人工智能数据中心，以满足巨大的需求。【原文：Big tech including Microsoft and Meta are stepping up spending to build out AI data centers in a rush to meet vast demand, but Wall Street is hungry for a quicker payday on the billions invested.】

item.title: 科技股拖累亚洲股市下滑，日本央行决议前日元接近三个月低点
item.description: 周四，亚洲股市下滑，原因是芯片行业股票追随隔夜华尔街同业的跌势，以及 Facebook 所有者 Meta Platforms 公司警告称人工智能成本加速上升。【原文：Asian stocks slid on Thursday as chip-sector stocks tracked overnight declines by Wall Street peers and Facebook owner Meta Platforms warned of accelerating costs for artificial intelligence.】
